verses.verse: And David made <WH6213> him houses <WH1004> in the city <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> and prepared <WH3559> a place <WH4725> for the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and pitched <WH5186> for it a tent. <WH168>

Then <WH227> David <WH1732> said, <WH559> None <WH3808> ought to carry <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> but <WH3588> <WH518> the Levites: <WH3881> for <WH3588> them hath the LORD <WH3068> chosen <WH977> to carry <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and to minister <WH8334> unto him forever. <WH5704> <WH5769>

And David <WH1732> gathered <WH6950> <WH853> all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> together to <WH413> Jerusalem, <WH3389> to bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> his place, <WH4725> which <WH834> he had prepared <WH3559> for it.
And David <WH1732> assembled <WH622> <WH853> the children <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> and the Levites: <WH3881>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath; <WH6955> Uriel <WH222> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> a hundred <WH3967> and twenty: <WH6242>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Merari; <WH4847> Asaiah <WH6222> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> two hundred <WH3967> and twenty: <WH6242>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Gershom; <WH1648> Joel <WH3100> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> a hundred <WH3967> and thirty: <WH7970>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Elizaphan; <WH469> Shemaiah <WH8098> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> two hundred: <WH3967>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Hebron; <WH2275> Eliel <WH447> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> fourscore: <WH8084>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Uzziel; <WH5816> Amminadab <WH5992> the chief, <WH8269> and his brethren <WH251> a hundred <WH3967> and twelve. <WH8147> <WH6240>

And David <WH1732> called <WH7121> for Zadok <WH6659> and Abiathar <WH54> the priests, <WH3548> and for the Levites, <WH3881> for Uriel, <WH222> Asaiah, <WH6222> and Joel, <WH3100> Shemaiah, <WH8098> and Eliel, <WH447> and Amminadab, <WH5992>

And said <WH559> unto them, Ye <WH859> are the chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the Levites: <WH3881> sanctify yourselves, <WH6942> both ye <WH859> and your brethren, <WH251> that ye may bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> unto <WH413> the place that I have prepared <WH3559> for it.

For because <WH3588> ye <WH859> did it not <WH3808> at the first, <WH4480> <WH7223> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> made a breach <WH6555> upon us, for <WH3588> that we sought <WH1875> him not <WH3808> after the due order. <WH4941>
So the priests <WH3548> and the Levites <WH3881> sanctified themselves <WH6942> to bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>

And the children <WH1121> of the Levites <WH3881> bore <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of God <WH430> upon their shoulders <WH3802> with the staves <WH4133> thereon, <WH5921> as <WH834> Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> according to the word <WH1697> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And David <WH1732> spoke <WH559> to the chief <WH8269> of the Levites <WH3881> to appoint <WH5975> <WH853> their brethren <WH251> to be the singers <WH7891> with instruments <WH3627> of music, <WH7892> psalteries <WH5035> and harps <WH3658> and cymbals, <WH4700> sounding, <WH8085> by lifting up <WH7311> the voice <WH6963> with joy. <WH8057>

So the Levites <WH3881> appointed <WH5975> <WH853> Heman <WH1968> the son <WH1121> of Joel; <WH3100> and of <WH4480> his brethren, <WH251> Asaph <WH623> the son <WH1121> of Berechiah; <WH1296> and of <WH4480> the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> their brethren, <WH251> Ethan <WH387> the son <WH1121> of Kushaiah; <WH6984>

And with <WH5973> them their brethren <WH251> of the second <WH4932> degree, Zechariah, <WH2148> Ben, <WH1122> and Jaaziel, <WH3268> and Shemiramoth, <WH8070> and Jehiel, <WH3171> and Unni, <WH6042> Eliab, <WH446> and Benaiah, <WH1141> and Maaseiah, <WH4641> and Mattithiah, <WH4993> and Elipheleh, <WH466> and Mikneiah, <WH4737> and Obed-edom, <WH5654> and Jeiel, <WH3273> the porters. <WH7778>
So the singers, <WH7891> Heman, <WH1968> Asaph, <WH623> and Ethan, <WH387> were appointed to sound <WH8085> with cymbals <WH4700> of brass; <WH5178>

And Zechariah, <WH2148> and Aziel, <WH5815> and Shemiramoth, <WH8070> and Jehiel, <WH3171> and Unni, <WH6042> and Eliab, <WH446> and Maaseiah, <WH4641> and Benaiah, <WH1141> with psalteries <WH5035> on <WH5921> Alamoth; <WH5961>

And Mattithiah, <WH4993> and Elipheleh, <WH466> and Mikneiah, <WH4737> and Obed-edom, <WH5654> and Jeiel, <WH3273> and Azaziah, <WH5812> with harps <WH3658> on <WH5921> the Sheminith <WH8067> to excel. <WH5329>
And Chenaniah, <WH3663> chief <WH8269> of the Levites, <WH3881> was for song: <WH4853> he instructed <WH3256> about the song, <WH4853> because <WH3588> he <WH1931> was skillful. <WH995>
And Berechiah <WH1296> and Elkanah <WH511> were doorkeepers <WH7778> for the ark. <WH727>

And Shebaniah, <WH7645> and Jehoshaphat, <WH3046> and Nethaneel, <WH5417> and Amasai, <WH6022> and Zechariah, <WH2148> and Benaiah, <WH1141> and Eliezer, <WH461> the priests, <WH3548> did blow <WH2690> with the trumpets <WH2689> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of God: <WH430> and Obed-edom <WH5654> and Jehiah <WH3174> were doorkeepers <WH7778> for the ark. <WH727>

So <WH1961> David, <WH1732> and the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> and the captains <WH8269> over thousands, <WH505> went <WH1980> to bring up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> out of <WH4480> the house <WH1004> of Obed-edom <WH5654> with joy. <WH8057>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when God <WH430> helped <WH5826> <WH853> the Levites <WH3881> that bore <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> that they offered <WH2076> seven <WH7651> bullocks <WH6499> and seven <WH7651> rams. <WH352>

And David <WH1732> was clothed <WH3736> with a robe <WH4598> of fine linen, <WH948> and all <WH3605> the Levites <WH3881> that bore <WH5375> <WH853> the ark, <WH727> and the singers, <WH7891> and Chenaniah <WH3663> the master <WH8269> of the song <WH4853> with the singers: <WH7891> David <WH1732> also had upon him an ephod <WH646> of linen. <WH906>

Thus all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> brought up <WH5927> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> with shouting, <WH8643> and with sound <WH6963> of the cornet, <WH7782> and with trumpets, <WH2689> and with cymbals, <WH4700> making a noise <WH8085> with psalteries <WH5035> and harps. <WH3658>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> as the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH935> to <WH5704> the city <WH5892> of David, <WH1732> that Michal <WH4324> the daughter <WH1323> of Saul <WH7586> looking out <WH8259> at <WH1157> a window <WH2474> saw <WH7200> <WH853> king <WH4428> David <WH1732> dancing <WH7540> and playing: <WH7832> and she despised <WH959> him in her heart. <WH3820>
